sentences.sentence: Don't think into the washing machine is enticingly, probably it is, you are suffering from disease of department of gynaecology root.
sentences.translation: 不要以为丢到洗衣机里就万事大吉，很可能这就是你患上妇科病的根源。

sentences.sentence: With its sunny beaches, vast system of freshwater springs and enticingly storied history, it is no wonder the myth of eternal youth lives on in the Sunshine State.
sentences.translation: 在阳光明媚的沙滩上，淡水清泉的庞大设施和迷人的历史故事，难怪这个阳光之州拥有青春不老的神话。
